commonroad_crime.measure.velocity.delta_v module

class commonroad_crime.measure.velocity.delta_v.DeltaV(config: CriMeConfiguration)

Bases: CriMeBase

Delta-v is a measures of the change in velocity that a vehicle experiences as a result of a collision

Shelby, Steven G. “Delta-V as a measures of traffic conflict severity.” 3rd International Conference on Road Safety and Simulati. September. 2011.

clcs: CurvilinearCoordinateSystem
compute(time_step: int, vehicle_id: Optional[int])

Specific computing function for each measure

ego_vehicle: DynamicObstacle
measure_name: Enum = 'Delta-v'
monotone: Enum = 'positive monotonic'
other_vehicle: Union[Obstacle, DynamicObstacle, StaticObstacle, None]
rnd: Union[MPRenderer, None]
